personalInfo.about: Born on January 2000, Bahraini national, currently based in Iran, Tehran. Fluent in Persian (native) and proficient in English.

summary.title: About
summary.value: Front-end developer with deep expertise in React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, and a strong track record in building high-performance, scalable applications (including a +90% Lighthouse mobile score). Skilled in system design, roadmap planning, and team leadership, with experience delivering complex business features. Curious and adaptable, with growing knowledge of backend development (Node.js, Express).

items.title: Technologies
items.value: TypeScript, React.js, Rollup, SASS, Browser History API

items.title: Role
items.value: Front-End Developer

items.title: Description
items.value: A lightweight React library for managing dialogs, sidebars, and sheets, with full customization and native-like back navigation that preserves browser history without side effects.

items.title: Key Achievements
items.value: Implemented native-like back navigation behavior, preserving browser history without side effects, enabled full customization of modal behavior and styling, and packaged and published as an npm library for easy integration into React & Next.js projects.

items.title: Technologies
items.value: TypeScript, React.js, React Pdf Renderer

items.title: Role
items.value: Front-End Developer

items.title: Description
items.value: a simple react-app with typescript for generating resume in pdf format (using react-pdf-renderer)

items.title: Key Achievements
items.value: Faster and optimized solution for cv updates through JSON files.

items.title: Technologies
items.value: TypeScript, React.js, Vite, TailwindCSS, React Router, React Query, React Hook Form, Zod, Sentry, Node.js

items.title: Role
items.value: System Architect & Front-End Engineer

items.title: Description
items.value: A scalable and resilient client-side quiz application built with pure React.js and minimal dependencies, ensuring long-term maintainability and performance

items.title: Key Achievements
items.value: Designed with an offline-first architecture and full mobile-first optimization, it supports seamless multi-language localization, flexible theming, and dynamic route handling for SEO-friendly growth. Its modular design system, strict separation of concerns, and strong caching strategy enable rapid customization, white-label opportunities, and future AI-driven enhancements.

items.title: Technologies

items.title: Key Achievements
